alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; Central Mountains; San Rafael Swell (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:59PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Emery and east central Sevier Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 259 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 23 miles southwest of Clawson, or 34 miles southeast of Manti, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Emery. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 93 and 107. Utah Route 10 between mile markers 3 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Castle Country; Central Mountains; San Rafael Swell
